product_title: GHome Smart Fingerprint Door Lock, 3 in 1 Smart Fingerprint Door Knob with App Control & Key, Auto Lock, Biometric Door Knobs with Lock for Bedroom, Garage, Home & Office
about_product: 【3-in-1 Unlock Methods for Ultimate Convenience】Ghome Smart Door Knob offers three unlocking options: fingerprint, physical key, and App control. The fingerprint door lock unlocks in just several seconds, providing fast and secure keyless entry. Suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, offices, and apartments, this door lock meets all your security needs.

【Smart App Integration & Mode Switching】Manage fingerprints, view unlock logs, and set auto-lock, passage, and privacy modes via the App. The electrical door lock supports passage, normal, and privacy modes, which can be easily switched by rotating the fingerprint area. Note: App control requires Bluetooth.

【Advanced Security & Privacy Protection】Unlock your fingerprint door knob in just 1.5 seconds, with ultra-fast 0.2-second recognition and 99.9% accuracy. The self-learning AI of our biometric door lock adapts to your usage, boosting recognition speed and reliability over time. All fingerprint data is stored 100% locally — with no cloud storage — for enhanced home security and privacy protection.

【Long-Lasting Battery & Easy Installation】The door knob with lock features a 400mAh rechargeable battery that fully charges in 3-6 hours and lasts up to 6 months. ( The fingerprint door knob has a low battery indication in App.) Easy to install with a screwdriver and fits apartments/office doors (1-3/8" to 2-1/4" thickness). Please confirm the product dimensions before purchase

【Versatile Use & Fast Support】Ghome Smart fingerprint locks stand out in modern home security and ideal for homeowners, hotel owners, and Airbnb hosts. We will offer comprehensive after-sales support and technical assistance to promptly address any issues, enhancing the usability of these smart locks.

customers_say: Customers find the smart door lock easy to install and use, with good quality and value for money. The fingerprint accuracy and lock functionality receive mixed feedback - while some say the fingerprint feature works well and the locking mechanism works well, others report issues with fingerprints not being recognized and being unable to unlock or lock the door. Moreover, the battery life is mixed, with some saying it lasts months before needing charged while others report issues with charging. Additionally, the Bluetooth connectivity receives negative feedback, with customers noting that it only connects through Bluetooth and the app won't connect.

top_reviews.review_comment: Door lock works really well ! Been using it for about a month and it was easy to install and use. I love how quick and transparent it is to switch it to normal passage mode and the app works really well too. It will randomly send me notifications though so I had to disable that. It looks cute in silver and the grip is nice. Overall big fan :) worth the price for me
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great value for this level of tech
top_reviews.review_comment: Bought 2. One for my gate and one for my garage door. The fingerprint scanner seems to work very well. I didn’t love that it didn’t have the full 10 digits for codes, but I hadn’t planned on using the code anyway. there’s a key just in case and the battery is rechargeable via usb c and says it will last six months. pretty easy set up on a free app. overall I’m super satisfied. we’re supposed to get our first major rain storm tonight so we’ll see if it’s waterproof.!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: UPDATE: changing from 4 star to 5 star, even though my past critique is still valid, honestly the product is so convenient, the scanner is just the right level of picky about your finger print, what i really wanted to talk about was how it operates. so on the inside of your locked home, you can twist the door knob and the door will open, without having to do anything other than setting the mode to pass through. and when you close the door behind you... the door is still locked, this is great i like this. another thing is that after unlocking the door the door will lock behind you, i cant name a single reason why anyone wouldnt like this feature, it lets me open my front door, and close it and not have to fiddle with anything else. its a great quality of life product. ---- Does what's intended Main selling points are the auto lock feature and rechargeable battery. Customization is pretty mid, only connects through Bluetooth so you can not remote unlock, because you are not physically present
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Good Product but can improve fingerprint recognition feature.
top_reviews.review_comment: It is a solid and good smart fingerprint doorknob. The only downside is that the fingerprint sometimes is not very sensitive to my finger. I need to try several times to unlock the door. It is very easy to install, too. The app interface and features are way limited for this doorknob, compared with another device from the same brand.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great product and amazing customer support.
top_reviews.review_comment: Amazing product, but what struck me by surprise was the cost and customer support. I had an issue with the fingerprint and could not share it with my son. (It was my fault and I just had to change a setting on the knob). But I had to talk to a support member and it might have been the best service I have ever gotten. Answered quick and good, really in depth responses. All in all this is amazing for its price, does the function perfectly and no issues( other than the one that was my own Fault).Also the app it comes with is very well made and very easy to use. Great product, great team working, I am very happy with my buy.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Specially beneficial to siblings of a Special Needs child
top_reviews.review_comment: **2 month update** Overall these have continued to work as desired. Main complaint: In order to use the App to unlock the doors you have to be in close proximity to the lock, which makes the feature basically worthless. Child was locked out of room due to below comment, and I was unable to remotely unlock the door while running errands. There are keys, but they are hidden so my brilliant special needs child doesn't get access the their rooms (the reason for the locks in the first place). An additional frustration, though NOT the products fault, is if you only upload one of your fingers and then damage the fingerprint (burn, skin peeling, etc.) you can no longer access...I'd encourage you to upload at least 2-3 different fingerprints just in case (which reduces the amount of people who can be programmed to the individual door knob). As others have mentioned, sometimes switching the lock from auto-locked to passageway doesn't immediately register and requires a couple turns back and forth. Hopeful that's just a tiny glitch that doesn't become permanent. Last note. Each door knob has its own configured fingerprints so the fingerprint on one doorknob is not saved in the system so that you can just add a fingerprint to a different doorknob using the app...you have to manually add a fingerprint to each doorknob. Not a big deal, but something to be aware of before buying. Altogether, still very pleased with the purchase. - - - - - - - - - - Purchased 3 Handles Having a special needs child you wreaks havoc on siblings belongings, I don’t know why I waited so long! The peace and validation it has brought for my other children was well worth the money, but hoping they last several years. Had some difficulty setting them up until I realized the problem was my WiFi and not the door handles. Overall I haven’t had any issues with them. The app is pretty easy to work, but wish I could add users without them needing an email address. Not a difficult fix, but think this would be a little more “family friendly.” Takes a few tries to do figure out where on the fingerprint will regularly spring the lock, but after that it’s good. So far, very pleased with them!! One of the handles lock switch isn’t quite as tight as I’d prefer, but hasn’t caused any issues. Only complaint is that it seems I need to be physically at the residence to unlock doors which is a little unnerving if I’m not home and one of my kids needs in
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I’m using it on my bedroom door and so far it works great. Installation was simple and quick—no need to be an expert. The fingerprint scanner responds very well and it does its job perfectly, giving both security and convenience. A good buy if you’re looking for something modern and practical.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I got this door knob about a month ago and been using it for a while. it would recommend it to any one in the market for it but dont use it for outdoors for indoor use use only. easy to use easy to install once you figure out how to. Now I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 for 3 reasons 1 there is no instruction on installation is not that hard but still also the software does not have an option to get notified for unauthorized attempts lastly does not work with alexa ! If ur okay with these it's a great well made product
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: These door handles are amazing! We ended up purchasing 2 additional handles after our initial purchase. Makes life so much easier
Very good and make life easier
